subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Giants punter Jeff Feagles is fully aware that his chance to reach the Super Bowl for the first time could rest in his gloved hands, especially if the game comes down to a field goal.
snippet: Giants punter Jeff Feagles is fully aware that his chance to reach the Super Bowl for the first time could rest in his gloved hands, especially if the game comes down to a field goal.
